name: Family-style Montreal Grilled Steak
description: Nothing brings a family together quite like mealtime! Grill the perfect steak for family picnics, celebrations, and backyard buffets. If the plan is to add steak strips to sandwiches, salads, pasta and beyond, slice it against the grain to break up its tough fibres and optimize tenderness.
preparation: Whisk first 4 ingredients in a shallow glass baking pan.
Add steak, turning to coat. Cover and marinate for up to 24 hours.
Season with Sea Salt and Pepper immediately before cooking.
Grill steak on barbecue over medium-high heat for 4 minutes per side.
Place cooked steak on a heated platter, cover loosely with foil and let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Slice thinly across the grain on the diagonal.
